# Day 08 - EC2 + S3 (Ubuntu VM)

## Objective

Understanding how to work with EC2 and S3

## Commands Practiced

## what I did

* Simulated EC2 generated file
* Uploaded to S3 bucket
* Deleted local copy
* Retrieved from bucket

## How I fixed

* 

## Key Learnings
* In AWS:
	- EC2 = machine that runs app = Ubuntu VM here
	- S3 = storage for files = ~/s3-bucket folder here
